modShortDescription: Tired of just surviving the Apocalypse? Live it large by sprucing up your home with window/door trimmings and alternate windows and doors!
modDescription:
Tired of just surviving the Apocalypse? Live it large by sprucing up your home with window/door trimmings and alternate windows and [doors](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/)! This 7 Days to Die mod adds recipes for these additional blocks to the Table Saw.

Adds the following block recipes to the table saw:

* woodWindowTrim
* woodWindowTrimBottom
* woodWindowTrimTop
* woodWindowTrimSides
* woodWindowTrimTopFancy
* doorTrimTop
* doorTrim2m
* window02
* houseFrontDoor1\_v1
* houseFrontDoor2\_v1
* woodCNRRound
* woodCNRRoundTop
* parkBenchA
* parkBenchB
* modularFireWoodStackA
* modularFireWoodStackB

Adds brassdoorknob recipe (ingredient for houseFrontDoor1 & 2) to the forge.

**Updated to v1.1**

Adds the following additional wooden block recipes to the tablesaw.

* woodCNRRound
* woodCNRRoundTop
* parkBenchA
* parkBenchB
* modularFireWoodStackA
* modularFireWoodStackB

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C3RW2SUz-sQ9UgfjzBae_wEz1o3alI7T/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17240-laz-mans-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Laz Man](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/laz-man/)
